# RStatsJobsBot

R code that serves the [\@RStatsJobsBot Twitter bot](https://twitter.com/RStatsJobsBot).

Bot deployed to GitHub Actions using the [`{botmaker}` R package](https://github.com/jcrodriguez1989/botmaker).
